pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, June 28, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, June 28, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:55 a.m. The Prime Minister will greet the President of Mexico, Enrique Peña Nieto, on Parliament Hill.

Peace Tower Entrance, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Welcoming Ceremony for President Peña Nieto.

Confederation Hall (Rotunda), Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage

10:05 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with President Peña Nieto.

Office of the Prime Minister, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only

11:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Signing Ceremony with President Peña Nieto.

Hall of Honour, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with President Peña Nieto.

House of Commons Foyer, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and President Peña Nieto will participate in a Q&A with youth.

Canadian Museum of Nature
240 McLeod Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the State Dinner given by Their Excellencies The Right Honourable David Johnston Governor General of Canada and Mrs. Sharon Johnston.

Ballroom, Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage only
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:40 p.m.
  • To cover events at Rideau Hall, media representatives must be accredited in advance by the Parliamentary Press Gallery and must confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office: Julie Rocheleau / 613-998-7280 / 613-302-0249 (cell) / julie.rocheleau@gg.ca.
  • For further accreditation information, please contact the Press Gallery at 613-992-6517 or email pressres2@parl.gc.ca.

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
